general_info.summary: This document appears to be a listing of various programs, schools, reports, initiatives, and informational resources related to Sharda University. It includes details about academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences and School of Nursing Science & Research, administrative and reporting documents such as Examination Annual Reports and University Brochures, as well as student-focused services and developmental programs like capacity building, skill enhancement, and entrepreneurship. Additionally, it mentions international campuses and important university regulations.

other_info.summary: This text appears to be a sitemap or a list of links related to the SUAT 2025 exam and Master of Computer Application (MCA) program at Sharda University. It includes sections on sample papers, global knowledge seekers, recruiters, banking and postal services, visa and insurance guidelines, observership programs, a mentoring portal, application procedures, career paths like Software Engineer or Programmer and Computer Support Service Specialist, and COVID-19 updates. The source link points to the university's official page for the MCA program.
